content: this easy knitting baby blanket is about to become your go-to baby shower gift cumulus degrade is an incredibly soft ombre striping yarn that practically does all the work for you you ll need 2 skeins of cumulus degrade 1 - we used the sahara nights colorway us 8 32-inch circular needles 1 https //www loopyarn com/collections/juniper-moon/products/juniper-moon-cumulus-degrade
